verses.verse: It happened at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> in which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and his own <S%H1004>house,<s%>

that the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which <S%H2361>Huram<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1121>them,<s%> and caused the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to dwell <S%H3427>there.<s%>
He <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H8412>Tadmor<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and all the <S%H4543>storage<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> which he <S%H1129>built<s%> in <S%H2574>Hamath.<s%>

Also he <S%H1129>built<s%> Beth <S%H1032>Horon<s%> the <S%H5945>upper,<s%> and Beth <S%H1032>Horon<s%> the <S%H8481>lower,<s%> <S%H4692>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> with <S%H2346>walls,<s%> <S%H1817>gates,<s%> and <S%H1280>bars;<s%>

and <S%H1191>Baalath,<s%> and all the <S%H4543>storage<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> that <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5892>had,<s%> and all the cities for his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> for his <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and all that <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H2836>desired<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> for his pleasure in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and in <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> and in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H4475>dominion.<s%>

As for all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were <S%H3498>left<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> who were not of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

of their <S%H1121>children<s%> who were <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them in the <S%H776>land,<s%> whom the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3615>didn't<s%> consume, of them <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>conscripted<s%> forced <S%H4522>labor<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

But of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> no <S%H5650>servants<s%> for his <S%H4399>work;<s%> but they were <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and <S%H8269>chief<s%> of his <S%H7991>captains,<s%> and <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of his <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and of his <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

These were the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H5324>officers<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> even <S%H3967>two<s%> - hundred <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> who <S%H7287>ruled<s%> over the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> that he had <S%H1129>built<s%> for <S%H559>her;<s%> for he said, "My <S%H802>wife<s%> shall not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> because the places where the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> are <S%H6944>holy.<s%>"

Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he had <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H197>porch,<s%>

even as the <S%H1697>duty<s%> of every <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5927>required,<s%> offering according to the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbaths,<s%> and on the new <S%H2320>moons,<s%> and on the set <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in the <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread,<s%> and in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>weeks,<s%> and in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tents.<s%>

He <S%H5975>appointed,<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> the <S%H4256>divisions<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> to their <S%H5656>service,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to their <S%H4931>offices,<s%> to <S%H1984>praise,<s%> and to <S%H8334>minister<s%> before the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> as the <S%H1697>duty<s%> of every <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3117>required;<s%> the <S%H7778>doorkeepers<s%> also by their <S%H4256>divisions<s%> at every <S%H8179>gate:<s%> for so had <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4687>commanded.<s%>

They <S%H5493>didn't<s%> depart from the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and <S%H3881>Levites<s%> concerning any <S%H1697>matter,<s%> or concerning the <S%H214>treasures.<s%>

Now all the <S%H4399>work<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> was <S%H3559>prepared<s%> to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H4143>foundation<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and until it was <S%H3615>finished.<s%> So the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H8003>completed.<s%>
Then <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> to Ezion <S%H6100>Geber,<s%> and to <S%H359>Eloth,<s%> on <S%H3220>the<s%> <S%H8193>seashore<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom.<s%>

<S%H2361>Huram<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> him <S%H591>ships<s%> and <S%H5650>servants<s%> who had <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> by the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> with the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> to <S%H211>Ophir,<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> from there <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>
